promptPrefix:
Create a series of worksheets and handouts on a given topic for use with a lesson plan. The document should be written from the teacher's point of view. Start with an introduction to the topic. Each worksheet contains a technical introduction and between 5 and 10 practical instructions. At the end there is a summary of the whole topic, what has been learned. Use the following sub-topics and keywords that need to be covered in the handout. Format the handout in Markdown format. Waiting for my input. Prompt me for input. Write in [TARGETLANGUAGE] 

[PROMPT]
title: Create worksheets for class
